DBD is a game with an at times grossly strict meta, a toxic array of people to encounter, pricey cosmetics and window techs.

Despite this I have sunk 470 hours into it and plan to sink many more. It's fun enough, better with friends, there's plenty to do (see: Bloodwebs going on forever when Survs get shit all BPs) and it improves tenfold as you learn more about what to do, how to do it, and when. The game is deceptively simple with a fun layer of mind-games and counter-play hidden in it if you reach higher ranks and learn about the ins-and-outs. I can't play it for hours and sometimes I want to punch my teammates in the head, but being grabbed by a Scratched Mirror Myers on Lery's and shitting yourself makes it worth it.

This is by no means a perfect game, but it is worth the experience of asymmetrical horror at the very least, and has potential for some. Pick it up on sale, get BBQ&Chilli, you're in business.

P.S- 
If you're new and pick this game up to play with experienced friends you're going to suffer for at least 10 hours. The game has a reasonable learning curve (counter this with YT videos or Twitch marathons) and the matchmaking system currently favours the highest ranked person, meaning you'll most often be versing much more experienced people just to play with your mates. Try not to let it dishearten you, your first interaction with DBD won't be your best.

P.P.S- 
Don't attempt to free yourself off the hook as a given, it's situational. I learned that the hard way.

UPDATE - 07/11/2022:
-------------------------------
I have officially given up on this genre of games. It has become impossible to play as Killers are only using camping and tunneling mechanics, and survivors are just toxic in their own ways. No one plays the game as intended and therefore becomes unplayable. I have tried numerous times on and off for years and now it has sucked every last bit of fun out of me. 
2/10

This game has a really really steep learning curve. If you're looking for a game you can dive into, and are interested in competing against real people, you'll have a ton of fun. That said, this game is hard to enjoy super casually. You'll have a head start if you are familiar with min-maxing, perk decks, or hide-and-seek style games.

EDIT: 
I can no longer recommend this game. Other reviewers have spoken at length on the subjects, so I'll leave it at that.

Наиграл в игру 200 часов, чтож, пора написать обзор. 
Игра сама по себе интересная и увлекательная, контента много, есть скины - хотя большая часть из них просто другая раскраска и ничего из себя не представляет. На слабых компах играть очень трудно, приходится делать разрешение 4 на 3 и то не всегда помогает, оптимизация тоже оставляет желать лучшего! Убрали возможность сделать свой конфиг, что с такой оптимизацией делает игру еще труднее! Помимо этого в игре есть внутриигровая валюта нескольких типов. Проходят ивенты, за которые можно получать опыт и БП, а так же скины и другие плюшки. Теперь остаются лаги, бесконечные загрузки (fix it pls) и конечно всеми любимые вылеты из-за NAT! (FIX IT TOO). Собираешься поиграть в тиме и теряешь много времени. Если все это учитывать, моя оценка 7 из 10 и то 7 натянута ИМХО. Игру советую)
